before-pa.narrative-text-1: Kua tae atu ahau i te tōnga o te rā.
before-pa.narrative-text-2: Kua kite ahau i tōku whānau.
before-pa.narrative-text-3: Te kakara pai o te kai.
before-pa.narrative-text-4: Inā te koa ki te hoki ki te kāinga.

landscape-view.line-1: Taku roa ki wāhi kē, kua hoki rā anō ahau ki te kāinga, ki tōku whānau.
landscape-view.line-2: Te maha o ngā rā o taku haerenga, nāwai rā, kei te pito o tēnei whārua te pā.
landscape-view.line-3: Me whakawhiti ahau i ngā mānia...
landscape-view.line-5: ...engari, tuatahi, me kimi ahau i te ara tika kia puta i te ngāhere.
landscape-view.line-6: Ko te kōrero o tōku whānau, ka kite ahau i te tohu muna: kei tēhea o ngā rākau rimu te whakawhitinga awa.

fern-interactive.intro-line-1: Kua takoto tētahi huinga rau huruwhenua ki runga i tētahi toka.
fern-interactive.intro-line-2: Te āhua nei ko te karere muna tēnei, i kōrerohia e tōku whānau, te tohu mō te whakawhitinga awa.
fern-interactive.intro-line-3: Me kimi māramatanga ahau ki te āhua motuhake o ēnei rau i te tuatahi, kātahi ka haere tonu atu.
fern-interactive.instruction-text: Pāwhiria ngā rau huruwhenua ki te tūhura i ngā āhuatanga.
fern-interactive.ant-hint: Kei te waihanga ngā pōpokorua i tētahi nama kei runga i te rākau nei, te āhua nei kei te hāngai ki ngā rau. Kei te tipu taku māramatanga ki te tikanga o aua nama.
fern-interactive.task-1: Me pēhea ahau te nama {{number}} e hanga?
fern-interactive.task-2: Ka pai tērā. Pēhea te nama {{number}}?
fern-interactive.final-text: Kua rite ināianei kia haere tonu atu i te ara.

fern-message.previous-stage-button: Me hoki anō mā te ara
fern-message.initial-text-1: Kua kite ahau i te karere muna, e iri ana i te tīwai rimu. Kua ūkuia ētahi o ngā ira i ngā rau, kua uaua ināianei te whakamatara he aha te tikanga.
fern-message.initial-text-2: Me kimi au i te tikanga o te kupu, kia mōhio ai au ko tēhea te ara tika whakararo ki te whārua, ki te whakawhitinga awa.
fern-message.initial-text-3: Ka kimi ahau i te tikanga o ngā reta – kua whakaaturia ki ngā rau huruwhenua – mā te whakamahi i ngā tohu kei runga i te poro rākau e takoto nei. Mā te kupu ka whākina mai au e mōhio ko tēhea te ara.
fern-message.hint-text: Ki te kore ahau e mārama ana ki tēnei waehere, tērā pea me hoki ahau i te ara. Mā ngā rau huruwhenua me ngā nama i hangaia e ngā popokorua pea au e āwhina.
fern-message.incorrect-text: Kāore anō kia tika. Ka whakamātau anō ahau.
fern-message.final-text: Ka pai! Nā te mea kua puta te nama ki runga i te rimu, ka haere tonu ahau i te ara kia whakawhiti ahau i ngā rimu e {{word}}. Kātahi ka heke ahau ki te awa, kia kite ai ahau i te whakawhitinga awa.
fern-message.next-stage-button: Heke ki raro ki te whārua

before-river.initial-text-1: Inā te tikanga! Kua rapu ahau i te tikanga o taua karere i waihotia e tōku whānau māku. Kua kite ahau i te ara muna, ā, kua tae ahau ki te awa.
before-river.initial-text-2: Aue! Nā te marangai i tērā wiki, kua riro te arawhiti i te wai. Nā te tere o te wai kāore e taea te kau atu, me hanga ahau i tētahi arawhiti hou. Ki te hanga ahau i te arawhiti ka taea hoki e te iwi te whakawhiti.
before-river.initial-text-3: Arā ētahi pōkai taura, engari he poto rawa te roa o tēnā, o tēnā mō te whānui o te awa. Me honohono ahau i ngā taura.
before-river.next-stage-button: Tīmata ki te hanga i te arawhiti

river-crossing.initial-text: Me honohono ahau i enei pōkai taura. Ko ēhea o ēnei taura hei whakahono ki te tārai i ngā whakawhitinga e 3 e tika ana te roa?
river-crossing.instruction-text: Tōia ngā pōkai taura ki te awa. Kia tūpato kei roa rawa, kei poto rawa rānei te taura. Tōia anō ki te whakahoki i ngā taura ki te taha awa mēnā kāore i te tika.
river-crossing.final-text: I tārai ahau i ngā taura e toru e tika ana te roa mō te arawhiti. Kāore e roa ināianei, ka rongo ahau i te kakara o ngā ahikā o te kāinga.
river-crossing.hint-button: Āwhina mai! Tīmatahia ngā arawhiti mōku...

before-plains.initial-text-1: Ka kite ahau i te pā kei tawhiti rā, engari me whakawhiti ahau i ngā mānia i te tuatahi.
before-plains.initial-text-2: He maha ngā tauārai. Ka kite hoki ahau i ngā kōhanga weka, me kore ahau te whakararu i ngā kōhanga hoki. Me pēhea taku kimi i te ara mōku?

plains.initial-text: I waiho tōku whānau i ngā tohu mōku, engari kua ngaro ētahi o ngā tohutohu i te marangai. Ka whakakapi mai he tohu anō i tēnei kōputu.
plains.instruction-text: Tōia he takahanga mai i te hōputu takahanga, ki te hanga i ngā tohutohu kia tae ki te ara o runga.
plains.kea-text: Aue! Kua tāhae te kea i ngā tohu huri whakatematau katoa! Me whakaoti i ngā tohutohu me te korenga huringa whakatematau. He nui te wāhi mō te maha o ngā tohutohu, ka kore pea ahau e whakamahi i te katoa.
plains.hint-text: Kāore i te whai wāhi mō te maha o ngā tohutohu. Me kimi tētahi rautaki kē ki te whakamahi i ngā tohutohu nei. Me whai au i te auahatanga, whakamahi ai au ēnei pere...

complete.final-text-1: Ko te kairapu ko ia te kite
complete.final-text-2: Tino pai! Kua tae rā anō koe ki te mutunga, arā, kua oti ngā panga.
complete.final-text-3: Ēnei momo panga e toru i whakaoti ai koe i tō haerenga, he momo ariā nunui nō roto i te marautanga hou mō te Hangarau Matihiko.
complete.final-text-4: Panuku ki raro mō te akoranga anō.
complete.forest-puzzle-text:
Ka hāngai te panga mō ngā huruwhenua ki te ngako o te whakamahinga o te kupu "matihiko" i a tātou e kōrero ana mō ngā pūrere matihiko, ngā whakaahua matihiko, te hunga matihiko me ērā momo kōrero! I tēnei ngohe, ka whakaaturia te whakaahuahanga o ngā karere e tukua, e rokirokia rānei ki ngā uara e rua noa iho.

Kei tēnei panga, ko ngā uara, ko ngā taha e rua o te huruwhenua, te taha kākāriki me te taha hina, engari kei ngā pūrere matihiko ka kōrero tātou mō ngā uara 0 me 1, arā, ngā "mati" o te "matihiko". Ka kīia tēnei te "whakaahuahanga matihiko", ko te whakahuahanga o ngā kōrero (o ngā pikitia, ngā oro, ngā ataata, ngā momo katoa rānei). Ka kitea tēnei i ngā Whakatupuranga 3 ki te 5 o te tupuranga Whakaaro Rorohiko i te marautanga Hangarau Matihiko.
complete.forest-puzzle-resources-heading: Kei te hiahia koe ki te toro atu anō mō ngā nama tāhūrua?
complete.forest-puzzle-resources:
• Kia Takatū ā-Matihiko - Pīkau 11: Whakaaro Rorohiko 3e
  • Computer Science Field Guide - Binary Numbers (reo Pākehā)
complete.river-puzzle-text:
I te panga whakawhitinga awa, i honohono ai koe i ngā pōkai taura, he momo rapanga nui tēnei mō ngā kaimātai rorohiko, nā te mea kāore anō rātou kia kimi i tētahi hātepe whāomo mō ngā rorohiko ki te whakaoti i ēnei momo rapanga! Mēnā he ruarua ngā taura, he ngāwari mā te rorohiko ki te whakamātau i ngā whakatakotoranga katoa e taea, engari mēnā he maha ngā taura, ka tipu taupūtanga te wā ki te whakamātau i ngā whakatakotoranga katoa - ahakoa te tere o te rorohiko ka eke i te mano tau pea ki te whakamātau i te katoa.

Ka kīia ēnei momo rapanga he rapanga "bin packing" ki te reo Pākehā, ka kitea hoki i te wā kei te uta i ngā rawa ki tētahi waka, i te wā rānei e tapatapahia i ngā poro rino, kia puta ai ngā roanga e hiahiatia ana. Tērā pea e pōhēhētia, ka taea e tētahi tangata te kimi i te hātepe tere ki te whakaoti i ēnei momo hōpanga, engari kāore anō kia puta tētahi, ahakoa te paraihe, kotahi miriona tāra te tārewa tonu.

He manomano ngā rapanga pēnei, ka kīia he 'whakaioio', he 'intractable' rānei - ka roa rawa te wā mā te rorohiko e kimi ana i te otinga. Ka hāngai tēnei ki te ariā o "ngā tūmomo hātepe" i Whakatupuranga 7 o te tupuranga Whakaaro Rorohiko o te marautanga Hangarau Matihiko - ko te tikanga, ka tūhuratia tēnei i te taumata 2 o te NCEA.
complete.river-puzzle-resources-heading: Ki te ako tonu mō ngā bin packing:
complete.river-puzzle-resources:
• Kia Takatū ā-Matihiko - Pīkau 17 (reo Pākehā)
  • Computer Science Field Guide - Bin packing problem (reo Pākehā)
complete.river-puzzle-button: Hononga ki te panga whakawhitinga awa
complete.plains-puzzle-text:
I te panga whakamutunga, ka whakamahia ngā tohutohu māmā ki te neke ki mua/huri whakatemauī/whakatekatau rānei mā runga i te tukutuku. He tīmatanga māmā tēnei mō te whakaako i te waihanga papatono mō ngā rorohiko (ko te 'tuhiwaehere' tēnā). Ahakoa ehara te nekeneke i runga i ngā tukutuku i te reo tuhiwaehere tūturu, he horopaki tēnei, kia ako ai ngā ākonga i tētahi kohinga tohutohu hāngai ki tōna kaupapa, kia waia ai rātou ki te waihanga i ngā tohutohu e whaia rawatia, ā, ka taea hoki te whakamātau i aua tohutohu, kia mōhio ai, he tika, kāore rānei.

Ki te kore aua tohutohu e tika, me tipu te kaha o te ākonga ki te āta kimi i te pūtake o te raru (arā te hapa, te 'iro' rānei), ā, ki te whakatikatika i ngā tohutohu me te whakamātau anō. Ko tēnei kaupapa: kia "wetewetea tētahi tūmahi rorohiko-kore ki ētahi tohutohu tika, tohutohu mārama" me te "whakatika (te patuiro)", he kaupapa nō te Whakatupuranga 1 o te tupuranga Whakaaro Rorohiko o te marautanga Hangarau Matihiko.
complete.plains-puzzle-resources-heading: Ki te ako tonu mō te tuhiwaehere me ngā karetao tamariki, tirohia:
complete.plains-puzzle-resources:
• Kia Takatū ā-Matihiko - Ngā Pīkau Hangarau Matihiko 5 me 7
  • CS Unplugged - Ngā Karetao Tamariki
complete.thanks: Kei te mihi ki a koe mō tō urunga ki tō tātou haerenga. Mēnā kua whakaoti koe i ngā panga, kua uru hoki koe ki ētahi o ngā kaupapa nui o te whakaaro rorohiko!

main.browser-note: Me whakamahi tētahi o ngā pūtirotiro nei: te Google Chrome, te Mozilla Firefox rānei.
main.browser-recommend: Whakamātauria tētahi pūtirotiro kē, pērā ki te Google Chrome, te Firefox rānei kua whakahoungia.
main.credit: I whakaputaina tēnei paetukutuku nā te pūtea a te Tāhuhu o te Mātauranga, mō te National Digital Readiness Programme, Kia Takatū ā-Matihiko. Kua purutia, kua whakahaerehia e te University of Canterbury, Computer Science Education Group. E tukuna ai ngā ihirangi o te paetukutuku kei raro i te Creative Commons BY-SA 4.0, ā, ko te paetukutuku pāhekoheko nei kei raro i te raihana MIT. Ka kitea hoki ngā raihana o ngā putunga tuhiwaehere o te tangata kē kei roto i te putunga GitHub. Ka noho te waitohu o Kia Takatū ā-Matihiko me ngā rauemi o te kaupapa nei kei raro i te manatārua a te Karauna. Bird sounds used in the sound files are from the Department of Conservation (New Zealand) and are under New Zealand Crown copyright, and are used with permission.
main.landscape: Tēnā whakamahi i tāu pūrere kia nohopae.
main.length: Kei te rohe o te 10 ki te 20 miniti te wā ki te whakaoti i tēnei kaupapa.
main.problem: Aroha atu! Kua puta mai he raru.
main.start-fern-interactive: Tīmatahia mai i ngā rau huruwhenua
main.start-fern-message: Tīmatahia mai i te karere ā-rau huruwhenua
main.start-river: Tīmatahia mai i te whakawhitinga awa
main.title: He Haerenga Panga HM
